sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Container,
  Text,
  Link,
  Flex,
  Divider,
  useBreakpointValue,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";

const Footer = () => {
  const showSections = useBreakpointValue({ base: false, sm: true });

  return (
    <Box bg="gray.700" color="white" p="10">
      <Container maxW="8xl">
        <Flex
          justifyContent="space-between"
          alignItems="flex-start"
          direction={{ base: "column", sm: "row" }}
          wrap="wrap"
        >
          {showSections && (
            <Flex direction="column" mb={{ base: "6", sm: "0" }} flex="1">
              <Text fontSize="lg" fontWeight="bold" mb="2">
                Nodebrew
              </Text>
              <Text fontSize="md" mb="4">
                Empowering and building communities
              </Text>
              <Text fontSize="sm">hello@nodebrew.tech</Text>
            </Flex>
          )}
          {showSections && (
            <Flex direction="column" mb={{ base: "6", sm: "0" }} flex="1">
              <Text fontSize="lg" fontWeight="bold" mb="2">
                Quick Links
              </Text>
              <Link mt="2" fontSize="sm">
                About Us
              </Link>
              <Link mt="2" fontSize="sm">
                Contact Us
              </Link>
              <Link mt="2" fontSize="sm">
                Privacy Policy
              </Link>
            </Flex>
          )}
          {showSections && (
            <Flex direction="column" mb={{ base: "6", sm: "0" }} flex="1">
              <Text fontSize="lg" fontWeight="bold" mb="2">
                Services
              </Text>
              <Link mt="2" fontSize="sm">
                Web Design
              </Link>
              <Link mt="2" fontSize="sm">
                Graphic Design
              </Link>
              <Link mt="2" fontSize="sm">
                Digital Marketing
              </Link>
            </Flex>
          )}
          {showSections && (
            <Flex direction="column" mb={{ base: "6", sm: "0" }} flex="1">
              <Text fontSize="lg" fontWeight="bold" mb="2">
                Resources
              </Text>
              <Link mt="2" fontSize="sm">
                Blog
              </Link>
              <Link mt="2" fontSize="sm">
                FAQs
              </Link>
              <Link mt="2" fontSize="sm">
                Tutorials
              </Link>
            </Flex>
          )}
        </Flex>
        <Divider my="4" borderColor="teal.700" />
        <Flex justifyContent="center" alignItems="center">
          <Text fontSize="sm" textAlign="center">
            © 2024 Nodebrew. All rights reserved. | Made with ❤️ in
            California and New Delhi
          </Text>
        </Flex>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Footer;
